Welcome to the Mehra Group

where a legacy of excellence meets the future of innovation.

Since 1964, we have been at the forefront of civil construction, building more than just structures - we build trust and relationships.

Our Leaders

Shailendra Mehra

Dhirendra Mehra

Our Core Values

Excellence

Our commitment to delivering superior construction quality within promised timelines.

Integrity

Upholding the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all business dealings.

Environmental Responsibility

Protecting and advancing environmental well-being by promoting sustainable construction practices.

"Aligning with PM's Vision"

Mehra Group stands firmly aligned with the vision of our Honorable Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, in the 'Housing for All' initiative. With over five decades of industry expertise, we are dedicated to making affordable housing accessible to all. Our core values of integrity, client-centricity, and unwavering quality assurance drive our commitment to realizing the Prime Minister's vision. Explore our completed projects and witness our mission in action as we support 'Housing for All.'

Vision and Future Goals

At Mehra Group, we envision pioneering new horizons in civil construction and real estate. Our goal is to lead the industry in innovation, sustainability, and client satisfaction.
